Description: You summon a huge boulder and launch it at a target in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing rock damage on a hit. This move saps you of energy, and may not activate it again until after the end of your next turn.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.
